Structs/Promise.html#/s:7Futures7Promise.name: fulfill(_:)
Structs/Promise.html#/s:7Futures7Promise.abstract: Fullfills the promise, setting a value to this promise’s Future

Structs/Promise.html#/s:7Futures7Promise.name: reject(_:)
Structs/Promise.html#/s:7Futures7Promise.abstract: Rejects the promise, setting an error to this promise’s Future

Structs/Promise.html#/s:7Futures7Promise.name: resolve(_:)
Structs/Promise.html#/s:7Futures7Promise.abstract: Resolves the promise, setting either a value or an error to this promise’s Future

Structs/Promise.html.name: Promise
Structs/Promise.html.abstract: A promise to provide a result later.

Structs/Promises.html.name: Promises
Structs/Promises.html.abstract: A typed container in which to provide specialized futures.

Protocols/PromisesExtended.html.name: PromisesExtended
Protocols/PromisesExtended.html.abstract: A protocol that can be used to add support for futures to a type of your choice.

Functions.html#/s:7Futures7promise_2on_A.abstract: Shorthand for creating a new Future<Value>, in an asynchronous fashion.

Extensions/DispatchQueue.html#/s:So17OS_.name: futures
Extensions/DispatchQueue.html#/s:So17OS_.abstract: The default queue, on which futures are observed and executed on.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC7.name: flatMap(on:callback:)

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC3.name: and(_:on:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC3.abstract: Returns a new Future, that resolves when this and the provided future both are resolved.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC6.abstract: Returns a new Future<Value> that fires only when all the provided Future<NewValue>s have been resolved.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC6.name: always(on:callback:)

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.name: alwaysThrowing(on:callback:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.abstract: Returns a new Future<Value> that will resolve with the result of this Future after the provided callback

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC7.name: discard(on:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC7.abstract: Returns a new Future, effectively discarding the result of the caller.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.name: whenFulfilled(on:callback:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.abstract: Adds a FutureObserver<Value> to this Future<Value>, that is called when the future is fulfilled.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.name: whenRejected(on:callback:)
Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.abstract: Adds a FutureObserver<Value> to this Future<Value>, that is called when the future is rejected.

Classes/Future.html#/s:7Futures6FutureC1.abstract: Adds a FutureObserver<Value> to this Future<Value>, that is called when the future is resolved.
